controls.caption: Length increment
controls.description: If non-zero, the length of every drawn line is increased by this value (or reduced if negative)
controls.name: lengthIncrement
backgroundColor
controls.caption: Background color
controls.description:
If this string is non-empty, all matrix is filled by this background color before drawing lines. Here (but not in "Color" above) the following formats are supported:
    #FFFF00 — HTML standard, alpha not allowed (yellow color)
    (1.0, 1.0, 0.0, 0.5) — all channels (normalized to 0.0..1.0), alpha allowed (yellow color with alpha 0.5)
    [255, 173, 0] — raw (non-normalized) values for each channels, alpha allowed
    0.5 — grayscale (normalized to 0.0..1.0)
